articles.title: Commentary: Cut carbs when you're on a sugar detox but keep fruit on your diet - CNA
articles.description: Fruits offer much more than just sugar. Increasing fruit intake while decreasing artificial sugar consumption will significantly reduce blood sugar, says an American expert.
articles.content:
Humans evolved to crave sweet tastes to get the nutrients needed to survive. A daily supply of vitamins, minerals and fibre is needed because our bodies cannot make them.

articles.title: Stocks slide and oil surges on renewed fears of Russia invasion of Ukraine - CNN
